```python
import random

def generate_notes(scale):
    notes = ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G"]
    scale_notes = [note for note in notes if note in scale]
    random_sequence = random.choices(scale_notes, k=8)
    return random_sequence

# Example usage
scale = ["C", "D", "E", "G", "A"]
print(generate_notes(scale))
```
